mapper.select: SELECT id, title, TO_char(start1, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') start1, TO_char(end1, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') end1, ALLDAY, TEXTCOLOR, BACKGROUNDCOLOR, BORDERCOLOR , username, leader_id, cateCode FROM CALENDAR

SELECT a.id, a.title, TO_char(start1, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') start1, TO_char(end1, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') end1, ALLDAY, TEXTCOLOR, BACKGROUNDCOLOR, BORDERCOLOR , username, leader_id,content,writer, a.cateCode,c.Catecode,c.CateName,c.CatecodeRef FROM CALENDAR a INNER join categori_jh c on a.cateCode = c.cateCode where a.id =#{id}
